Posts.Content: May 21, 2016 02:35PM - edited May 21, 2016 02:38PM by Shirlann45 Hi, I am an 18 year survivor with Triple Negative Medullary cancer. I had a lumpectomy and radiation. I worked the whole time and was scared silly, but not any more. 83% of bc's are curable. Hang in there and keep posting and soon you will be helping others. Gentle hugs, Shirlan
Posts.Title: When does it become "real?" Addlantan Shirlann45
